name: Bun-Bun Battlefield
description:
Welcome to Bun-Bun Battlefield

Bun-Bun Battlefield is an endless tactics fighter where a group of bunnies are thwarted by the garden animals in their attempt to get some carrots. The bunnies must fight the garden animals and survive. How many waves can you last?

How to Play

In Bun-Bun Battlefield you start with 5 different buns:

  • Fighter Bun
  • Water Bun
  • Builder Bun
  • Excavator Bun
  • Healer Bun

Aside from the Fighter Bun, each Bun has a power unique to it. 

  • Water Bun
    • Can create water tiles that creates an obstacle for all animals except the bees and butterflies.
  • Builder Bun
    • Can create fences that creates an obstacle for all animals except the snake, butterflies, and bees.
  • Excavator Bun
    • Can dig holes that creates an obstacle for all animals, except the mole, butterflies, and bees.
  • Healer Bun
    • Can heal your comrades in battle.

Here is the important part! You only get one special bun for each ability! Once you lose that bunny you don't get it back. That means you won't be able to repair the obstacles or create the obstacles if you lose that bunny. For example, if you dig holes with the Excavator Bunny and he dies, you will no longer be able to fill those holes.  

Actions

Each turn you can move your bunny if you want. You can also choose one of the other actions in addition to moving: Attack, Wait, Use the Special Ability. 

The goal of the game is to last as long as you can.
